data.name: SteamTopia
data.detailed_description:
SteamTopia is set in a steampunk enviroment with steam powered machines and gadgets.

In this world where the money and power come first, the player must expand more and more with powerful machinery and make the most of resources available.
For that, automation is key, everything must be automated, from resource gathering, to their processing and selling.

However, automation alone won't take you far. The villagers of SteamTopia are helpful and eager to buy and sell the best products to thrive through the journey.
data.about_the_game:
SteamTopia is set in a steampunk enviroment with steam powered machines and gadgets.

In this world where the money and power come first, the player must expand more and more with powerful machinery and make the most of resources available.
For that, automation is key, everything must be automated, from resource gathering, to their processing and selling.

However, automation alone won't take you far. The villagers of SteamTopia are helpful and eager to buy and sell the best products to thrive through the journey.
data.short_description: SteamTopia is a casual, steampunk factory-building game, in a time where money and expanding your machines are the only things that matters.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or superior
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or superior
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
